Title: Universe.WCF.Behaviors
Description:
Universe.WCF.Behaviors provides behaviors:
- Easy migration from Remoting
- Transparent delivery
- Traffic Statistics
- WCF Streaming Adaptor for BinaryWriter and TextWriter
- etc
